d1: Hi. This is the intro to the game and it has some flavor text
Click on the people who match the descriptions on the wanted posters
d2: Wanted posters can have multiple criteria
Only click on people who match every category in a wanted poster
d3: We've detected some intruders who can only be identified by their body temperature
Use this new dual window technolgy to see body temperature
d5: Now, we're going to search for people with specific contraband
In your thermal camera, press the new button to switch to x-ray mode
